aqua ombre -size h hook abbreviations gauge chain chain h hook---8 single_crochet = 2 slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es size single_crochet single_crochet small wristlet = 5 25 x 2 75 yo yarn over medium wristlet = 5 75 x 3 75 special stitches *you will be working in both sides of the starting chain and continuing to work in the round throughout this pattern loopy phone wristlet pattern by misty makes 1 small phone wristlet fits iphones 4 & 5 chain 11 1 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in next 9 loops of chain rotate the chain so you are now working on the other side of the chain 2 single_crochet in 1st loop single_crochet in next 9 loops join to 1st single_crochet 22 2 ch1 single_crochet in each st around do not join 22 3-20 single_crochet in 1st st and in each st around continue to work around in a spiral until you reach 20 rounds or until you are within ¼ of your desired length **make sure you end your last round on one of the small sides ** 21 single_crochet in next 5 sts chain 6 single_crochet in next 11 sts chain 38 single_crochet in next 11 sts you should now be at the chain 6 space place 6 single_crochet s around the chain single_crochet in next 11 sts you should now be at the chain 38 space single_crochet in each back bump of the chain single_crochet in next 6 sts slip_stitch around the entire piece join to 1st slip_stitch fo weave in ends and you re done medium phone wristlet fits most phones that are considered bigger than an iphone chain 15 1 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in next 13 loops of chain rotate the chain so you are now working on the other side of the chain 2 single_crochet in 1st loop single_crochet in next 13 loops join to 1st single_crochet 30 2 ch1 single_crochet in each st around do not join 30 3-24 single_crochet in 1st st and in each st around continue to work around in a spiral until you reach 24 rounds or until you are within ¼ of your desired length **make sure you end your last round on one of the small sides ** 21 single_crochet in next 7 sts chain 6 single_crochet in next
